channel.title: Question about adsense code

item.title: Question about adsense code
item.dc:creator: @RSPS_Mirrors RSPS Mirrors
item.description:
@RSPS_Mirrors wrote:

That makes sense. Reiterating what Ecko said, browsers obviously ignore comments because they read the html code and display it on to your browser (but it still read my google_ad variables commented out?). Either way I know it works, so thanks for the clarification.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about adsense code
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

Not sure what Ecko is talking about. The reason there’s HTML comments in the tag is because of old browsers (pre IE6) that didn’t support . If you have an unknown tag in the browser, it just renders whatever’s inside of it on the page as text. So people without JS support saw random code in the middle of the page.

These comments are totally unnecessary today though.

<script type="text/javascript">
google_ad_client = "ca-pub-0008153771310244";
/* affiliates */
google_ad_slot = "2207160199";
google_ad_width = 728;
google_ad_height = 90;
</script>

Read full topic

item.title: Question about adsense code
item.dc:creator: @RSPS_Mirrors RSPS Mirrors
item.description:
@RSPS_Mirrors wrote:

Ok that explains it, thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about adsense code
item.dc:creator: @Ecko Ecko
item.description:
@Ecko wrote:

Because Google is not a browser. Comments are ignored by a browser, but would not be by whatever parsing script Google has.

Read full topic

item.title: Question about adsense code
item.dc:creator: @RSPS_Mirrors RSPS Mirrors
item.description:
@RSPS_Mirrors wrote:

<script type="text/javascript"><!--
google_ad_client = "ca-pub-0008153771310244";
/* affiliates */
google_ad_slot = "2207160199";
google_ad_width = 728;
google_ad_height = 90;
//-->
</script>
<script type="text/javascript"
src="http://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/show_ads.js">
</script>

When it says copy and paste this to your page, I don’t get how it works. The ad_slot and ad_client are commented out so how does Google know the difference?

Read full topic
